introductions: Ah!  Detective!  I was hoping to run into you. | I was informed of being a suspect in [Victim]'s unfortunate passing.  My condolences, of course. | Let me assure you that neither [Green] nor Green Wine condone murderous acts such as this. | Green Wine is completely at your disposal for this case.  I, however, am an extremely busy man.  So if you have questions for me, keep them brief and on subject.
openers: Here for another interrogation, I assume?
Can't this wait, detective?  I am a very busy man.
openersMorning: Early bird gets the wine, detective. How may I help you?
openersDay: I am a very busy man, detective.
openersNight: I am quite weary. Make it snappy, detective.
closers: You have some things to think about.
closersMorning: May the rest of your day fare thee well, detective.
closersNight: It's shame that we met under these circumstances, detective.  Otherwise I may have hired you.
Time for a glass of wine and a wink of sleep. You should try it, detective.
startHintYes: You said [Victim] was killed with [Weapon]? Something to do that is not ... uncommon. | However, I know that [Suspect] has [Weapon]. Start there.
startHintNo: You said [Victim] was killed with [Weapon]? Something to do that is not ... uncommon. | However, I cannot think of where to start. I appologize.
